<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete subticket"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/subtickets/{ticketId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Permanently deletes a subticket (child ticket) from its parent ticket. Subtickets are full tickets linked to a parent for hierarchical work tracking. This operation removes the link and soft-deletes the subticket.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with `ShowChildTickets: true` to find subtickets. Extract `Items[].TicketId` from child tickets.

**Workflow Example**
1. Find subtickets: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with `ShowChildTickets: true` → identify subticket's `TicketId`
2. Delete subticket: [DELETE /api/v1.0/subtickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/delete-subticket)
3. Verify removal: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{parentTicketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) to confirm child is removed

**Note**: Unlike subtasks, subtickets are full tickets with their own timeline and activities. Deletion is a soft-delete; administrators may be able to restore.

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) – Search with ShowChildTickets filter
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/new](/docs/api/tickets/create-ticket) – Create tickets (including subtickets)

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Ticket identifier for the subticket to delete.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}

</ParamsDetails>
